item.title: Activate Coresight components in a Yocto environment for the Zedboard
item.author: Author
item.description: Activate Coresight components - Software side - Method #1 Generate a core-image-minimal Just follow https://pcotret.github.io/yocto-zedboard-101/ Customize a linux-xlnx kernel uImage The idea is to create a custom kernel where the support of Coresight components is enabled. Unfortunately, we cannot customize the usual core-image-minimal image with Yocto tools. Fortunately, we can do it on a linux-xlnx image! Activate Coresight components - Hardware side ðŸ˜¨
